title: The Russian village that lost its men to war
summary_full: In the remote village of Sedanka in Russia's Far East, almost all of its fighting-age men have left to join the Ukraine war.
summary_public: In the remote village of Sedanka in Russia's Far East, almost all of its fighting-age men have left to join the Ukraine war.

RU.label: negative
